Question: Despite the danger, this person insisted on doing all his own climbing and stunts.
Hints: Pale Rider became one of this person's most successful films to date.
Since 1967, this person has run his own production company, Malpaso, which has produced all except four of his American films.
This person, then 28, felt his character Rowdy was too young and cloddish for him to feel comfortable with the part.
